title: MAC game file: Copying game File from Mac to Mac
body:
hi,

can anyone help me in this, i have the game on my MacBook Pro fully updated and working, i bought a new Mac Pro, can i just simply copy the game file from my MacBook Pro to my Mac Pro.

i mean can i copy the game file instead of downloading the whole 5 GB all over again ?
both systems are Mac based.

thank you

replies.body: In theory, that should work. Just copy the League of Legends.app file. If you have trouble, let me know. Worst case scenario, you can patch back up, but yeah, no reason to download all those files if you don't need to.
